# python3

if __name__ == "__main__":

    t = int(raw_input())
    l = []

    i = 0
    while(i < t and t <= 10**6):
        ch = int(raw_input())
        if(ch <= 10**18):
            l.append(ch)
        i = i + 1
    for i in l:
        if(i % 2 == 0):
            print "YES"
        else:
            print "NO"
